Here is the summary:

No significant updates were reported from the Execution Layer (EL) side, but it was mentioned that they're still working through some issues with their testnet setup.
The Consensus Layer (CL) team made progress in implementing the Bellatrix upgrade for devnets. They also started testing the merge transition on a private network and are planning to run more tests soon.
There were no updates reported regarding mainnet timelines or specific deadlines, but it was mentioned that they're aiming to have everything ready by mid-summer.
The CL team is still working through some issues with their testnet setup.
